description: Once a Cyberdine Android she has been reengineered and modified by the HRX Corporation. And a whole new orgasm control capabilities. Once finished with her new upgrades and programming they had the new SlaveBot identify herself. Now they had to perform a stress test to see if she would be able to hold up. Once finished with her flogging and spanking she was made to have a very powerful orgasm. Satisfied with Meg’s performance they are confident that her Master will enjoy his new Submissive Slave Slut!
title: Ashley Fires SciFi Dreamgirls: Re-engineered To Be A Bondage Slave
